Intro.paragraph: Hello, I'm Mohammed. I'm a full-stack developer. I enjoy building sites & apps. My favorites stack are Javascript (JS Framework) and Java (Spring).

About.title: About Me
About.paragraph: After graduating with a degree in Statistic and Business Intelligence, and working in the data analysis field, I decided to pursue my passion for IT programming. I've enrolled in a WEB development program at Openclassrooms Institute, and learned a lot about Full-Stack WEB development. My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect. I love the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem. I am currently looking for a full-time position as a software developer.

Projects.title: My projects
Projects.descriptionProject1: This site is a clone of a real estate agency. It is responsive and was developed with React and TypeScript. It uses the Context API to manage global state of the application. Some unit tests were written with Vitest and React Testing Library. The site is deployed on Vercel.
Projects.descriptionProject2: This site is a blog of posts. It is responsive and was developed with Angular and Node.js. The user can sign up and log in, create a post, update and delete it (these two last actions are only possible for the creator of the post). The site is deployed on Amazon Web Service.
Projects.descriptionProject3: This site is a shop of products. It was developed with Angular and Express (Node JS). We can visualise and search products in Products tab. We can create a product, update and delete it, in Admin tab. The Backend is deployed on Render.com, & the Frontend on Vercel.
Projects.descriptionProject4: This site is a clinical data management application. It was developed with ReactJS and Spring Boot. The user can create and view patient-related info. He can consult and create clinical data related to patients. The Backend & Frontend are deployed on AWS via a DOCKER | CI/CD mechanism.
Projects.descriptionProject5: The application is a quiz, with a series of questions. For each question, we have several answer propositions, of which we can only select one answer. At the end, a result is displayed, based on the answer elements, and invites the user to redo the quiz. The application is deployed on Vercel hosting platform.

Experiance.title: My Experience
Experiance.descriptionExperiance1: I graduated in statistics and business intelligence at Paul SABATIER University. I found a job as an IT corresponding, and then worked as statistician in medicare sector.
Experiance.descriptionExperiance2: I'm working as a SQL developer in medicare sector. I'm in charge of the development of scripts, intended to process and analyze data.
Experiance.descriptionExperiance3: I'm now a full-stack developer looking for a job, included freelance job. My stack includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, Angular, Express (Node.JS). I'm open to full-time opportunities.
